server
Class Domain

java.lang.Object
  server.Domain
Direct Known Subclasses:
GetEnsembleDna, GetUCSCDna
public abstract class Domain
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class is the superclass of all the classes that retrieve nucleotide sequences from the different genome browsers.

Version:
$Id: Domain.html,v 1.13 2009/10/16 23:08:53 tizatt Exp $
Author:
Arjun Chandrasekhar
